attributes.action: Get fuel companies to bring diesel prices in line with petrol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to know why diesel is £0.15 pence a litre more than petrol we were encouraged to buy diesel engines when the price of diesel was cheaper than petrol but now diesels a popular the price if far more expensive than petrol

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
